function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Air pollution serving as a carrier for the virus","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission due to extended air pollution exposure","Mitigation":"Reduce air pollution in cities","Technologies":"Air purification systems, emission control technologies","People":"City residents, particularly those in areas with high air pollution","Owner":"City governments, environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Inconclusive evidence on the association between environmental parameters and COVID-19 transmission","Impact":"Difficulty in designing appropriate protection and response measures","Mitigation":"Conduct more context-specific research on environmental factors","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, research methods","People":"Urban policymakers, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Potential for increased water pollution caused by drugs used for treatment of COVID-19 patients","Impact":"Risk of contamination of water resources with pharmaceutical residues","Mitigation":"Enhanced wastewater treatment to remove pharmaceutical residues","Technologies":"Advanced wastewater treatment systems, filtration technologies","People":"Public using water resources, environmental agencies","Owner":"Water management authorities"}]}
